QuestData.Title: In the Rear With the Gear
QuestData.Description: Prisoners of the Twilight's Hammer are forced to lug around sundries for the war effort, like common pack animals. I want those supplies, and if we can free a few poor souls from the Hammer's shadowy grip, all the better.$B$BKill the slave drivers along the road to our south and nearby slaves should make a break for it.$B$BSearch the packs they leave behind for anything valuable, and destroy anything you can't carry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 36 Twilight Supplies left behind from freed Twilight Slaves.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you created some havoc down there, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: <Jadi kicks open one of the crates and picks up a curved dagger within. She immediately winces in pain.>$B$BAugh! Cursed - this metal is cursed - it bites!$B$B<When the dagger falls to the ground, it shatters, as if made of brittle glass.>$B$BWhat demented workmanship is this? $n, I've never fought any foe like this before.
